Text:
Thanks for uploading this! This works perfectly and it is very easy to use.

It's good to play a game in all its uncensored glory as the artists originally intended it.

Screw censorship!
how do you install it? just click on the .exe? Or do I have to put them into the program files section?

for those of you that get an error message with this crack, here's how to install it properly: 

1. Drag it in your Punisher program files. 
2. Click on the exe.
3. When the installer pops up, it will ask for install destination.
4. Click "browse", then choose the program files folder that the Punisher game is under (otherwise, it will give you an error message)
5. after successful install, launch the newly installed Icon and press the white skull.
6. TAH-DA!!!!
